value:
$WmMPID_冬祭ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Winter21,Face|Zzz...$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭マヌエラ,ch17_30_Manuela_F_Winter21,Face|Asleep again? What am I going to do
with you? We'll need all hands on
deck to get these gifts delivered!$k$pYou two, we have to hurry. Think of
this like an assignment. A field trip, if
you will. Just take some gifts and—$k$p$WmMPID_双界リシテア,ch17_23_Lysithea_FF_Pair,Face|Professor Manuela, you aren't trying
to treat your students as employees,
are you? That would be improper...$k$p$nMPID_ルーテ|It is also a foolish tactic. I am no
student of Garreg Mach; her rank
is of no importance to me.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭アスレイ,ch08_26_Asley_M_Winter21,Face|Now, now. Let's not spoil the festival
by arguing! We're all working toward
the same goal here, aren't we?$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭イグナーツ,ch17_22_Ignats_M_Winter21,Face|Yes! We're all winter envoys, after all.
Let's get these gifts delivered. The
children are counting on us!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_MNS_FE16_09,0|$WmMPID_冬祭マヌエラ,ch17_30_Manuela_F_Winter21,Face|Well, that was quite the ordeal. I was
worried we wouldn't make it, but we
managed to get everything delivered.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Winter21,Face|All thanks to you! I couldn't have
done it without you. *yawn* And
everyone else, of course.$k$pI think there will be a lot of happy
dreamers tonight.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭マヌエラ,ch17_30_Manuela_F_Winter21,Face|I suppose everyone will sleep well,
knowing they got their heart's desire.
Except for me, as usual.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Winter21,Face|What do you mean? I might have
another present in here...$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭マヌエラ,ch17_30_Manuela_F_Winter21,Face|That's not what I mean. The winter
festival is a time to be around
the people you love. And, well...$k$pIt's hard to feel festive when you're
a solitary soul like me...unable to love,
unable to be loved in return...$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Winter21,Face|What? I wouldn't say that! You seem
like a really caring person to me!$k$pDidn't you just work all night
delivering gifts to people you don't
even know?$k$pI bet those kids would say you're
their favorite person ever. That
sounds like love to me!$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭マヌエラ,ch17_30_Manuela_F_Winter21,Face|That's not the kind of love I mean...
Ugh. I sound like a broken record,
complaining about men again.$k$pYou're right. I should be grateful for
their affection. Maybe it's time for
me to rethink my priorities...$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Winter21,Face|I'm sure you'll feel better after a
good night's sleep. *yawn* That
always makes me feel better.$k$pActually, you know what? I heard you
humming those carols earlier. I bet
you'd feel better if you sang a song!$k$pYour students say you have the most
amazing singing voice. I'm sure
everyone would love to hear you.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭マヌエラ,ch17_30_Manuela_F_Winter21,Face|Haha. You know what? I just might do
that. Thank you, Mirabilis. I appreciate
your encouragement.$k$pAnd who knows? If I sing my best,
maybe someone special will hear it...
Oh, Manuela, there you go again.$k$pWhat I mean is, I won't deny Askr the
chance to hear the famous songstress
in her prime!$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Winter21,Face|Yay! I can't wait to hear it! *yawn*
But do you mind if I closed my eyes
for a bit? Zzz...$k$p$Sbs150|
